example.eg: Can you review my message before you send it?
example.egtrans: 你把我的信息发出之前能帮我看看吗？

example.eg: Let me review what happened to see if we can do anything about it.
example.egtrans: 我们把发生的一切回顾一下，看看能不能做点什么。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 回顾, 反思, 复审, 复核, 复查

example.eg: I'm reviewing my geography for a quiz tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 我在为明天的地理考试复习。

example.eg: The reporter reviewed the new product for the newspaper.
example.egtrans: 记者为报纸写了新产品的评论。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 评论, 评介, 批评

example.eg: The review did not say many good things about this car.
example.egtrans: 该评论对这款车没说多少好话。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 评论, 评测, 点评

example.eg: The hotel has had a hundred reviews, only two of them negative.
example.egtrans: 这家酒店有100条点评，其中只有两条是负面的。

example.eg: Her review of the scientific study found no problems with the reasoning or methods used.
example.egtrans: 她在经过审查后认为，该科研项目的论证与方法都没问题。

example.eg: He undertook a thorough review of the company's computer security.
example.egtrans: 他对公司的计算机安全做了一次彻底的检查。

example.eg: The Hollywood Review is a respected movie industry magazine.
example.egtrans: 《好莱坞评论》是一本很有公信力的电影业界杂志。

example.eg: The general conducted a formal review of the troops while they stood at attention.
example.egtrans: 将军进行了一场正式的阅兵，其间部队全体都立正站好。

example.eg: The school's approach to discipline needs a full review.
example.egtrans: 该校的惩罚方式需要全面的复查。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重审, 复查, 复核

dsense.name: review
dsense.guideword: US (revision of lessons before an exam)

example.eg: The teacher told us to read page 6 of the textbook as a review for the history test.
The general reviewed the troops before battle.
A few years later he reviewed his actions and decided that he would not do things the same way again.
The proposed changes to the law are still under review.
Alexandra writes the book reviews for a national newspaper.
Every employee has a job performance review at the end of each year.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作绩效评估，工作绩效考评

example.eg: Rebecca is writing a literature review summarizing current knowledge on this subject.
I rarely read movie reviews: I prefer to make my own judgements.
I completed a peer review of my co-worker's performance.
After a performance review is an appropriate time for a pay raise.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绩效评估，绩效考核，业绩考评

example.eg: The new hit musical opened to rave reviews on Broadway.
If you are not satisfied with the police department's ruling on a complaint, you could appeal to the review board.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 审查委员会，评审委员会

example.eg: A dissertation should include a systematic review of the relevant literature.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 系统评价，系统性评价，系统综述
